title: Honorable Key Fragments
body:
If these aren't good enough punishment/reward to encourage/deter toxicity in players, so much so that ranked rewards took there place to punish dishonourable players. Why do riot think they are enough to incentivize reformation? What reasons do toxic players have to not just keep/re-offend? Especially with the wave of players being hit with ranked reward ineligibility. 

You took everything they worked for other than self pride in their rank from them due to honour level cap on rewards. What reason would they have to reform or change their behaviour? Seems like a major flaw in the honour system being linked to ranked rewards. Why not give extra back to honourable players in terms of consistent rewards, through honour level rewards (Like the Key Fragments except good) and an extra skin for honourable players and insentize consistent good behaviour rather than a large punishment or reward based on nothing to do with the effort players have put into there years worth of league and ranked hardship/climbing.

This isn't me asking for ranked rewards because lord knows people on this board love talking down to players who they dont deem honourable i just wish the punishment and reward system linked to honour was more well thought-out and complete.

replies.body: Would be far less of an issue if first time offenders didn't have to spend literal months grinding back to honor 2 for rewards.

Completely agree. That would be a massive improvement along with progress bars and more information on honour to help people gauge there progress rather than everyone receiving the same blanket punishments and no information.

> What reasons do toxic players have to not just keep/re-offend? 

Risk of permaban

Loss of seasonal ranked rewards.

Risk of Perma Ban seems to be closing in on a lot of people who aren't upstanding positive members of the community, dont think that means much especially to the people who are willing to commit time into the game to climb ranks without being completely uncommunicative or overwhelmingly positive in chat. 

New Accounts, New Grind, Seemingly never a reason for a new attitude though.

Loss of Seasonal Rewards? They arent getting the yearly ones what makes you think they will aim for or even care about the seasonal ones?

> [{quoted}](name=Season 8 PTSD,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=cxskGiEG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-11-13T04:12:17.026+0000)
>
> Loss of Seasonal Rewards? They arent getting the yearly ones what makes you think they will aim for or even care about the seasonal ones?

Uh, up to this point, season rewards have been yearly rewards.  Thought you'd be aware of that considering your name.

Yes but they just broke them up into 3 mid seasonal breaks, so the new seasonal ones arent yearly thats the point we are talking about bud. I can link you a video if you are unfamiliar with the goings on with the game.

So when i say "they arent getting the yearly ones" i mean the old style and when i say "care about the seasonal ones" im talking about the three new reward breaks inside a season.

I'm aware.  I said, "up to this point," because I don't think the person to whom you were replying was talking about the separated rewards for next season.  The majority of complaint discussions flooding the board this past week have been specifically about the current rewards people aren't getting.  His point had nothing to do with split vs. year, but rewards in general.  To paraphrase his response to you:

If players don't want to risk losing their accounts or becoming ineligible for rewards, they should control their behavior.

And my response was answering that with. Well like i said in my first post people who will still continue to play league and carry on playing to grind ranks arent going to care in the long run about these rewards and they also most likely wont care about the new seasonal rewards if they are broken into 3 split ones since they wont get any since one chat ban and you'll be locked at honor 0 for that season split.

He gave reasons players would care about reforming to my post and i answered it with a counter argument as to why these points are irrelevant. I think you are the only one confused about what any of the posts in this thread are discussing or mean. I completely understood his post and mine made sense in response.
Uh.. I think free skin shards for being nice is an insanely generous incentive. That's just my opinion though.

you get skins that are NO LONGER AND WILL STAY LEGACY, so rare skins like 10% of the community has, you get free skins, the large loading symbol, and the best checkpoint rewards out of the 5 ranks.

tying ranked rewards to honor is a good idea, since most people want their season rewards, WHICH WAS ANNOUNCED AT THE START OF THE YEAR, People should know that if they are toxic, they will not receive their rewards.

its just people complaining Riots honor system is too strict.
